remarks: The zero operator is a bounded linear operator.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Oct-2015.)
statement:
0nmhm.1 $e |- V = ( Base ` S ) $.
0nmhm.2 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` T ) $.
0nmhm.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` S ) $.
0nmhm.g $e |- G = ( Scalar ` T ) $.
0nmhm $p |- ( ( S e. NrmMod /\ T e. NrmMod /\ F = G ) -> ( V X. { .0. } ) e. ( S NMHom T ) ) $.
